title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Not sure if many are aware of Myria but I bought 100,000 when the price was £0.0012 back in August and the price is currently £0.009 which means I am now 750% up on my investment. I bought 100,000 after watching a few videos online saying how Myria can see the returns Gala did in 2021 which was over 100x. I am not tempted to sell yet but think I will be if it gets to point where I am up 10x on my investment but part of me wants to hold on till bull run in the hope that it can 100x. Anyone have any thoughts on Myria at all? Like i said above many say it can see the gains Gala saw in 2021 but I am not sure if that is just youtubers trying to hype the project or if it really can do that well.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Price is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.Not sure if I am being too greedy but feel this is early and can easily do another 10x from current price which would give me a 100x. Anyone else invested?

comments.author: MFahad
comments.body: The token recently listed in Bybit exchange with a reward for traders. I also heard about this token in video from a well trusted youtuber but I took it lightly and after that the token pumped 1000%. You are lucky for taking entry on the time. Project is looking promising and current position show that we big exchanges Binance and Coinbase may list it in the future. I suggest for selling your initial investment and just play with profit.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Quote from: MFahad on December 15, 2023, 10:37:09 AMThe token recently listed in Bybit exchange with a reward for traders. I also heard about this token in video from a well trusted youtuber but I took it lightly and after that the token pumped 1000%. You are lucky for taking entry on the time. Project is looking promising and current position show that we big exchanges Binance and Coinbase may list it in the future. I suggest for selling your initial investment and just play with profit. Yes I think that is what I will do take out my investment and then leave the rest to hopefully see a great bull run over the next few years.It has gone down a little in the last 12 hours so will wait for it to pump back up and then take out the money I put in.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 15, 2023, 09:24:28 AMPrice is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.Not sure if I am being too greedy but feel this is early and can easily do another 10x from current price which would give me a 100x. Anyone else invested? Wow thats a good profit mate. It seems your timing is totally sync with the current market. For sure many have missed that game even me just heard it when theres so much noise already. But I dont want to fomo with its current price especially it pumped 10x already. Maybe a pull back if theres a chance then I purchase some. What network does myria do?

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 15, 2023, 09:24:28 AMPrice is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.Not sure if I am being too greedy but feel this is early and can easily do another 10x from current price which would give me a 100x. Anyone else invested? I think Myria will blow and it will be huge imo and if your initial target was really 100x then why not stick with it until the end? We aren't yet in the bull run and gaming sector is likely still be a top contender in the upcoming bull run so better hold on them. Well, it's not bad to take profit or get your initial investment and let the other tokens play along.

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: MFahad on December 15, 2023, 10:37:09 AMThe token recently listed in Bybit exchange with a reward for traders. I also heard about this token in video from a well trusted youtuber but I took it lightly and after that the token pumped 1000%. You are lucky for taking entry on the time. Project is looking promising and current position show that we big exchanges Binance and Coinbase may list it in the future. I suggest for selling your initial investment and just play with profit. I took part in deposit and trading event hosted by Bybit exchange, and it proved to be a lucrative opportunity for making trading profit in the short term, due to its note-able volatility offering favorable entry and exit points for traders. The participants will also receive reward at the end of the campaign.MYRA a utility token built on Ethereum network has a substantial supply is 50 Billion, the market price is expected to remain few cents in coming days and weeks, t However, MYRA might evolve as promising long term investment in the future.https://myria.com/token/

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: To be honest I have put a £100 or so in a few different projects as lottery plays for the bull run and Myria is the only one where I timed it perfectly and bought at the bottom. I only now need it to reach £0.12 which would be a £1b market cap and 100x for me - I just wish i put more in but to turn £120 into £12,000 would still be a great return.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: As you buy this token earlier and keep it for longer time then you will have more benefit than those who is buying myria token now. Although its price is not higher enough that anybody cannot afford it but still there occurred a recent surge in myria token so I think if someone wants to diversify portfolio then they should not forget about myria.Most of the people are greedy enough that when they sometimes see pump of certain token then they rush towards its investment but i think that everyone should buy any token with lower value and should investigate about it first. The current price of myria is 0.012$ which means that those who have bought it previously are now in profit and as Bull season is coming so I think all coins are going to show unexpected gain.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 15, 2023, 09:24:28 AMPrice is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.you just have to be careful now you bought it at a very low value and now you are looking at profit already if you hold too long you might lose your chance of selling it but i think it’s still gonna increase with how the market is looking these days

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Layer 2 solution for gaming and NFt on Ethereum Blockchain, there are too many layer 2 solution doing everything that we can expect. It is time these guys who are providing layer 2 solution should move on to other blockchain. The layer 2 ecosystem is congested with the same or similar crypto projects. It is time to move on to other blockchain similar to Ethereum that have something new within their ecosystem.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on December 15, 2023, 04:00:48 PMQuote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 15, 2023, 09:24:28 AMPrice is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.you just have to be careful now you bought it at a very low value and now you are looking at profit already if you hold too long you might lose your chance of selling it but i think it’s still gonna increase with how the market is looking these daysAny project I've found solid, keeping it to myself and ensure to grab significant profits before telling my colleagues around who will also banter for their own time to work out research concerning these projects. When a project we invested on pumps, it then means we're currently open to becoming one of very young crypto traders that are impacting people around with positivity. The market is in different view, I totally understand we're earning and losing good quality time in the market, more reason we should adapted with trending projects in the market.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Myria update - I did not sell any in the end and not sure if I should be regretting that decision or if It will pump again soon. The price almost reached £0.015 a few weeks ago which was a 12x for me at the time , it is now at £0.0072. I am still 6x up overall but think I will wait for it to go up again where I am at least 10x up again to cash out my investment. Anyone else in Myria?

comments.author: Ben Barubal
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on December 15, 2023, 09:24:28 AMPrice is now up to £0.012 so am currently 10x up on my investment which is great but still yet to take any profits.Not sure if I am being too greedy but feel this is early and can easily do another 10x from current price which would give me a 100x. Anyone else invested?   If I were to sell it to you, because of what I can see in its graph chart, it will continue to drop because it has been able to lift quite high, and of course it will have liquidation to have an uptrend again in the market.  And besides that, this is also not the right opportunity to buy it because its price value will drop because, at the moment, its price movement is quite volatile with what is currently happening in the exchange. It's still quite high risk, to be honest.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: MFahad on December 15, 2023, 10:37:09 AMThe token recently listed in Bybit exchange with a reward for traders. I also heard about this token in video from a well trusted youtuber but I took it lightly and after that the token pumped 1000%. You are lucky for taking entry on the time. Project is looking promising and current position show that we big exchanges Binance and Coinbase may list it in the future. I suggest for selling your initial investment and just play with profit. Success is everybody's friend and I'm happy for the OP for buying into a reliable token that is still pumping and has the potential of giving multiple times profit, although I hope that he takes your advice and sale the worth of his investment capital, then let the ROI to be playing along.Myria, is not Bitcoin, so it can dump and not pump again. Many investors that have taken advice from YouTubers and influencers from different platforms on the social media have different stories to tell, some bought into scam projects and coins that are doomed from the start, so it's better to carry out proper research after hearing about any projects from a YouTuber.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: When we get back to £0.012 again I will definitely take some profit , that is a 10x for me and looking back i should have taken some then when i had the chance a few weeks ago. This is my first bull run so seeing something pump 10x in just a month or so is new to me so I am still learning and soon will understand when is best to take some profits.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on January 05, 2024, 08:58:07 AMWhen we get back to £0.012 again I will definitely take some profit , that is a 10x for me and looking back i should have taken some then when i had the chance a few weeks ago. This is my first bull run so seeing something pump 10x in just a month or so is new to me so I am still learning and soon will understand when is best to take some profits. Sell now, as all chances are that the price will decrease. If an agreement is reached on ETFs, the price will decrease because investors will turn to Bitcoin. If the opposite is true, there will be a major correction in the price. Therefore, in both cases, the possibility of a decrease is more likely, and it is better for you to sell now.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on January 05, 2024, 08:58:07 AMWhen we get back to £0.012 again I will definitely take some profit , that is a 10x for me and looking back i should have taken some then when i had the chance a few weeks ago. This is my first bull run so seeing something pump 10x in just a month or so is new to me so I am still learning and soon will understand when is best to take some profits. now that the value has increase to a very large extent, don't you think it's the best time to sell it out?Like you've said already, you are just new to this sudden experience of a positive surge in value and I doubt you expected to get much profit from this first investment. Why not sell it now and at least know that your first altcoin investment didn't yield a loss rather than wait till the price goes down to a point I regret.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: I didn't buy much of it i only have 100,000 and as I have seen it reach almost £0.015 I feel selling now at less than half that price is too low.If the prices crashes further next few weeks I will buy more and hold that till bull run.

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: This currency is interesting to speculate on, but what discourages me are the fees on the ethereum network. I would like to buy a little, like 20 dollars, but paying 12 dollars for gas to carry out the transaction is really discouraging
